items.sentence: I'm going to give Tom a bicycle for his birthday.
I'm expecting a phone call from Tom this morning.
I'll drive Tom home on the back of my motorcycle.
I wonder why Tom isn't wearing his glasses today.
I tried to tell Tom that, but he wouldn't listen.
I saw Tom stealing apples from one of your trees.
Why don't you just leave things the way they are?
Tom could hear people talking outside his window.
Tom claims not to know Mary, but I think he does.
Tom can barely make himself understood in French.
